name: Ascension (Potasio Team)
description: “Ascension” is a 2D Isometric action and adventure game for PC where you will play as the villain of the game “Nero” and you will advance towards the top to recover the domains that have been taken from you, defeating the enemies of the different floors (just those that they were once your subordinates) and thus take revenge on "Hero" the main hero who took away the title of Final Boss of the Level.
